short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites and get free time for what truly matters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JustBlock is a browser extension that helps you stay productive by blocking distracting websites like social media and video platforms. When you try to access a blocked site, JustBlock displays a simple page reminding you to stay focused. If you need to unlock a website, solve a captcha to remove it from your blocked list. JustBlock is an easy-to-use tool designed to help you take control of your online distractions and improve your productivity.
